rooms.description: A grand entrance hall featuring Art Deco design elements, with geometric patterns and high ceilings.
An expansive living room integrated with modern Art Deco furniture and ambient lighting. Large window openings in the north for natural light.
A comfortable dining area adjacent to the living room, designed with elegant lines and balanced proportions.
An efficient kitchen with an island counter and Art Deco fixtures. Includes necessary appliances as per local norms.
Spacious master bedroom with a generous balcony offering natural light and fresh air. Incorporates Art Deco motifs in furnishing.
Cozy bedroom ensuring privacy, integrated with built-in storage and a balcony space for relaxation.
Balanced bedroom design featuring contemporary Art Deco styling and ample natural light through its dedicated balcony.
Flexible guest room with a small balcony and modern furnishings complementing the overall design aesthetic.
